item.description:
Don't settle for just symptomatic relief for your time management ills; get down to the root causes. Attention, Boundaries, and Choices are the ABCs of a whole new way to manage time sustainably. Come with questions for speaker Pam Kristan, author of Awakening In Time: Practical Time Management for Those on a Spiritual Path. You'll practice hands-on techniques, and learn how to make satisfying choices despite the impossibility of doing it all.

This is a discussion organized by our Net-Working Mothers Subgroup, but is open to EVERYONE. If you have questions, please be in touch!
item.name: Discussion: Sustainable Time Management and How To Practice It
